A C D E F G I L M N O R S T U V W

A

AbstractEmbeddedDbTestCase - Class in net.jakubholy.dbunitexpress
Parent class for DbUnit test cases that want to use an embedded (Derby) database for testing instead of an external standalone DB in few easy steps.
AbstractEmbeddedDbTestCase() - Constructor for class net.jakubholy.dbunitexpress.AbstractEmbeddedDbTestCase

Ignore - for internal use by JUnit's Rule handling.
assertAcceptable(Object) - Method in interface net.jakubholy.dbunitexpress.assertion.ValueChecker
Throws an AssertionFailedError if the actual value is not as expected.
assertNext(Object[]) - Method in class net.jakubholy.dbunitexpress.assertion.RowComparator
See RowComparator.assertNext(String, Object[]).
assertNext(String[]) - Method in class net.jakubholy.dbunitexpress.assertion.RowComparator
See RowComparator.assertNext(String, String[]).
assertNext(String, String[]) - Method in class net.jakubholy.dbunitexpress.assertion.RowComparator
Compare the next row (or the 1st one if first use) with the actual data, ignoring differences in type between the expected and actual values.
assertNext(String, Object[]) - Method in class net.jakubholy.dbunitexpress.assertion.RowComparator
Compare the next row (or the 1st one if first use) in this.RowComparator.resultTable with the provided expected values and throw an assertion failure if they differ.
assertNext(String, String, String) - Method in class net.jakubholy.dbunitexpress.assertion.RowComparator
Assert that the values of the next row are same as the three ones provided here after being converted to strings via toString().
assertNext(String, String) - Method in class net.jakubholy.dbunitexpress.assertion.RowComparator
Same as RowComparator.assertNext(String, String, String) but for a two-columns table.
assertNext(String) - Method in class net.jakubholy.dbunitexpress.assertion.RowComparator
Same as RowComparator.assertNext(String, String, String) but for a one-column table.
assertRowCount(int) - Method in class net.jakubholy.dbunitexpress.assertion.RowComparator
Assert that the number of rows in this.RowComparator.resultTable is as expected.

createAndInitDatabaseTester() - Method in class net.jakubholy.dbunitexpress.EmbeddedDbTester
Create the internally used database tester, which supports fully qualified table names and uses an embedded Derby database.
createAndInitializeTestDb() - Static method in class net.jakubholy.dbunitexpress.DatabaseCreator
Create and from a DDL initialize the embedded Derby DB.
createCheckerForSelect(String) - Method in class net.jakubholy.dbunitexpress.EmbeddedDbTester
Create a new RowComparator for comparing results of a SQL select over the test database with your expectations.
createDataSetFromFile(String) - Method in class net.jakubholy.dbunitexpress.EmbeddedDbTester
Create a data set from the given XML file stored either in the default location of "testData" or anywhere on the classpath.
createDbSchemaFromDdl(Connection) - Static method in class net.jakubholy.dbunitexpress.DatabaseCreator
Run a DDL on the (empty) test database to create the schemas and tables to fill with test date.
createDefaultDataSet() - Method in class net.jakubholy.dbunitexpress.EmbeddedDbTester
Create the default data set used to fill the test DB by reading the default XML "dbunit-test_data_set.xml".
CUSTOM_CONFIG_FILE - Static variable in class net.jakubholy.dbunitexpress.EmbeddedDbTester
An optional file for defining other then the default connection to a test database, it may include any of the following properties: PropertiesBasedJdbcDatabaseTester.DBUNIT_CONNECTION_URL PropertiesBasedJdbcDatabaseTester.DBUNIT_DRIVER_CLASS PropertiesBasedJdbcDatabaseTester.DBUNIT_PASSWORD PropertiesBasedJdbcDatabaseTester.DBUNIT_USERNAME If a property isn't defined in the file then the value of the appropriate DEFAULT_JDBC_* constant is taken.

D

Utility class for initializing the embedded Derby test database.

E

EmbeddedDbTester - Class in net.jakubholy.dbunitexpress
The core class for unit tests that need to access a database, by default an embedded (Derby) database, as simply as possible.
EmbeddedDbTester() - Constructor for class net.jakubholy.dbunitexpress.EmbeddedDbTester
Create a new embedded DB tester ready to use, optionally configured by properties defined in the file "dbunit-express.properties" if it's somewhere on the classpath.
EmbeddedDbTester(String) - Constructor for class net.jakubholy.dbunitexpress.EmbeddedDbTester
Create a new embedded DB tester ready to use with a non-standard data set file, optionally configured by properties defined in the file "dbunit-express.properties" if it's somewhere on the classpath.
EmbeddedDbTesterRule - Class in net.jakubholy.dbunitexpress
The core class for unit tests that need to access a test database, implemented as JUnit Rule and thus self-initializing before each test.
EmbeddedDbTesterRule() - Constructor for class net.jakubholy.dbunitexpress.EmbeddedDbTesterRule
 
EmbeddedDbTesterRule(String) - Constructor for class net.jakubholy.dbunitexpress.EmbeddedDbTesterRule
Create a new embedded DB tester ready to use with a non-standard data set file, optionally configured by properties defined in the file if it's somewhere on the classpath.
EnhancedDatabaseTesterDecorator - Class in net.jakubholy.dbunitexpress.impl
A decorator that adds the additional methods defined by IEnhancedDatabaseTester to any IDatabaseTester.
EnhancedDatabaseTesterDecorator(IDatabaseTester) - Constructor for class net.jakubholy.dbunitexpress.impl.EnhancedDatabaseTesterDecorator
Create a new enhanced tester that delegates all default operations to the provided actual tester.
ExceptionInterpreterFactory - Class in net.jakubholy.dbunitexpress.exception
Provide an instance of IExceptionInterpreter appropriate for the underlying database.
explain(Throwable) - Method in class net.jakubholy.dbunitexpress.exception.derby.DerbyExceptionInterpreter

explain(Throwable) - Method in interface net.jakubholy.dbunitexpress.exception.IExceptionInterpreter
Descend recursively the cause chain to find the first SQLException and explain it as if calling IExceptionInterpreter.explain(SQLException) for it.
explain(SQLException) - Method in interface net.jakubholy.dbunitexpress.exception.IExceptionInterpreter

I

IEnhancedDatabaseTester - Interface in net.jakubholy.dbunitexpress
The actual manager of the test database with useful methods for accessing it and modifying its content.
IExceptionInterpreter - Interface in net.jakubholy.dbunitexpress.exception
Tries to explain an exception thrown by the underlying database based on knowledge of the database and it's error codes.
initResultTableAndColumns(IDatabaseTester, String) - Method in class net.jakubholy.dbunitexpress.assertion.RowComparator

initResultTableAndColumns(ITable) - Method in class net.jakubholy.dbunitexpress.assertion.RowComparator

RowComparator - Class in net.jakubholy.dbunitexpress.assertion
A helper class for comparing actual and expected values of the test database' rows using DbUnit.
RowComparator(IDatabaseTester, String) - Constructor for class net.jakubholy.dbunitexpress.assertion.RowComparator
A new comparator that creates the internal resultTable (ITable) from the provided SQL and accesses the test database via the provided tester.
RowComparator(ITable) - Constructor for class net.jakubholy.dbunitexpress.assertion.RowComparator
Check expected values against the provided ITable.
RowComparator() - Constructor for class net.jakubholy.dbunitexpress.assertion.RowComparator
You must call RowComparator.initResultTableAndColumns(ITable) or RowComparator.initResultTableAndColumns(IDatabaseTester, String) if using this constructor.
